body_html: Have ran the seeds and tested the dropdown again and is selecting teams corresponding to the year. But have noticed that '2018' is empty. Which makes sense as selecting 'past' teams! Should it display as an option still? If so, would be good to at least re-order the list so displays in date order, I can look at this week?

body: Have ran the seeds and tested the dropdown again and is selecting teams corresponding to the year. But have noticed that '2018' is empty. Which makes sense as selecting 'past' teams!  Should it display as an option still? If so, would be good to at least re-order the list so displays in date order, I can look at this week?
